original_text:
But if they had stood in my council,
    then they would have proclaimed my words to my people,
and they would have turned them from their evil way,
    and from the evil of their deeds.
korean_text: 그들이 만일 나의 회의에 참여하였더라면 내 백성에게 내 말을 들려서 그들을 악한 길과 악한 행위에서 돌이키게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: But if they had stood in my council,
then they would have proclaimed my words to my people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성에게 내 말을 선포했을 것이고,

sentences.original_text: and they would have turned them from their evil way,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 그 악한 길에서 돌이켰을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: and from the evil of their deeds.
